Key Arguments: The proposed legislation could be abused by the government to label inconvenient truths as misinformation.
The law would have a chilling effect on free speech, as noted by social media companies like Meta.
Free debate and the flow of information are necessary to discern truth, and censorship would hinder this process.
The legislation could lead to further censorship, especially in light of perceived past censorship during the COVID-19 pandemic.
